name: market for pump station | pump station | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4985/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'pump station', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a pump station. The Infrastructure represents a pump station with a capacity of 644,546 m3 per year and a lifetime 70 years. The process include  building materials, end-of-life for the infrastructure and land use. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'pump station',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  pump station', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
